I hope they burn.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556a9e496368722bb2e60200#post_556a9e496368722bb2e60200
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556a97ad63687204e9ff0a00#post_556a97ad63687204e9ff0a00
I guess in the end, Pokemon prevails as a franchise consumer wise.

I remember in my childhood the bitter rivalry between the two franchises. 
[/bq]
You do have to give it to digimon though; they don't constantly rehash the same plot for every season.

*sassy z-snap*


Joking aside just a bit of rumor stuff: you know how I talk about geek news once in a while?  You know how political interest groups have been trying to make geek fandoms their own personal metaphorical bitch for years?  Please don't turn this into a discussion about gg cause it's only tangibly related and there's plenty of shit going on not just game related but politically elsewhere; political groups thanks to how geeks have been uniting against people trying to politicize mass media franchises are having a mild panic attack thanks to how hard geeks are pushing back against interest groups in general.

To put it bluntly: political interest groups that want to make geek subculture their metaphorical bitch to turn them into political propaganda are getting scared cause they're seeing how badly anti-geeks are getting their ass handed to them in general the last year and are getting their asses sued right off them and are panicking.

Geeks vs anti-geeks/political interest groups the past year:
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/660/525/a4e.gif!
Geeks, "That's what you get b****!"


I doubt there's going to be any more Jack Thompson style politicians in the long run cause geeks are getting tired of people's shit and so are the companies that own the franchises.  If someone tries to start shit with say ghost in the shell I don't think disney will be happy with that politician or such.


*Tl:dr; politicians and political interest groups tried to start a new culture war; they got their asses kicked; other political groups are having panic attacks in fear of getting ass kicked as well.*
